description:
The young http://anidb.net/ch65713 [Orega Fire] loves the Oreca world. One day a mysterious treasure chest, that has the power to summon monsters into this realm, appears. The name of the chest is none other than http://anidb.net/ch65714 [Pandora]. As they encounter countless battles together, the friendship between Fire and his monsters grows. However, they are soon involved in a battle with the Demon King Mus who threatens the peace and harmony of the Oreca world...
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Meet Orega Fire, the young Oreca battle-loving main character.  One day while playing Oreca, a herd of Mashed Tomatoes suddenly appears in the sky!  Not only that, the monsters on the cards kids were playing with start to inexplicably vanish.   A strange occurrence in an otherwise peaceful town!
Source: crunchyroll

During the battle with the Red Dragon, Warrior Tanta refuses to listen to Fire and continues to attack without command!  Although Fire is clearly vulnerable, he used his own body as a shield to protect Tanta and the others.  Even Tanta is moved by this act of camaraderie...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Warrior Tanta and the Red Dragon
戦士タンタとレッドドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
Fire happily reminisces about winning the battle.  When suddenly, Pandora appears again and another battle begins!  This time the opponents who stand before Fire are the Black Knight Gebulg and the Black Flame Warrior Bahn!  Tanta just can’t match the Black Flame Warrior’s strength.  Tanta who strongly seeks power gets his hands on the enemy’s “Halberd of Darkness”...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Warrior of Black Flames Bahn

REGULAR.description:
Although his entire body is shrouded with a dark aura, Tanta successfully wins against Bahn.  However, Tanta is swallowed by the power of darkness and transforms into the Dark Warrior Tanta as he leaves with Gebulg.  Bahn is left behind but he regains his regular form as the Fire Warrior Bahn and joins Fire’s team...
Source: crunchyroll

Fire fiercely battles against the fire summoner Heat, Robot Type II, and Usamiko. Heat then summons Girime who paralyzes everyone, but despite that Fire successfully gains another win and Heat subsequently joins Fire’s team. Meanwhile, a curious rumor spreads among the students about ghosts haunting the school at night.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 見参! 炎の召喚士ヒート!

REGULAR.description:
Fire and his friends encounter mysterious circumstances while visiting their school at night.  After a few bizarre run-ins, they find Pandora!  Death Mort and the Necromancer Tsukuyomi appear as well and it’s time to battle!  Thanks to Bahn’s attacks, for a moment it seemed as though Fire was victorious, but then Mort and Tsukuyomi combined and turned into Ashiyura.  The battle isn’t over, yet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アシユラ 驚異の合体!

REGULAR.description:
After Kerogon causes some trouble for Fire at school, he’s made to stay home.  However, Kerogon finds Fire’s “Fire Dragon Egg” card that he’s forgotten at home and decides to bring it to Fire.  Kerogon’s about to have a long day!
Source: crunchyroll

The Raging Serpent Mushuf’shu suddenly appears in front of Fire and his friends!  Mushuf’shu’s powerful moves overwhelm Fire!  But then, thanks to Kerogon’s suggestion, Fire uses the Fire Dragon Egg and summons the Red Dragon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Smelly Attack! The Raging Serpent Mushuf`shu
臭撃! 怒る蛇ムシュフシュ

REGULAR.description:
Fire encounters Tanta who has been possessed by the Black Knight Gebulg’s and the Halberd’s dark powers.  The battle leaves everyone weak, including Fire himself.  When all of the sudden, Data steals the Halberd of Darkness away from Tanta!  Data’s wish to be stronger like Fire helps to break the Halberd’s spell!
Source: crunchyroll

Fire and the others continue practicing Oreca battles at the bowling alley when Pandora shows Fire a scene from the Oreca realm where Swordsman Dante and Fallen King Saliel are battling.  Fire becomes enraged after watching Saliel fight unfairly.  Pandora introduces Fire and the others into Dante and Saliel’s battle!  However, Fire struggles with Saliel’s unmatched strength!
Source: crunchyroll

Fire, Data, and Gantetsu form the Oreca Boys to fortify their strength in order to win against the Demon King Mus.  Meanwhile, Gantetsu asks Data to teach him how to Oreca battle and head towards the Dojo to train.  When suddenly, Pandora shows up in a training uniform!  After bringing them to the bowling alley, Pandora claims to give the both of them cards if they’re successful in training.  Then, the Demon Queen Riviere and Demera appear!
Source: crunchyroll

Data and Gantetsu continue to fight the Demon Queen Riviere at the bowling alley.  Gantetsu was almost overwhelmed by Riviere’s strength, but Data’s words helped push him to use an ultra EX attack for a come-from-behind victory!  They successfully won the battle against Riviere and Demera but there’s no time to celebrate; the Demon King Mus suddenly appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Demon Queen Riviere of the Demon World
魔界の女王リヴィエール

REGULAR.description:
Fire suddenly finds himself facing the Demon King Mus!  The battle begins as soon as they switch their location to the demon castle.  Meanwhile, the Lamanders are attacking children in Fire’s home town!  Both the human realm and the Oreca realm are affected by Mus’s sheer strength!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Scorching Purgatory! The Power of Demon King Mus!
灼熱煉獄! 魔王ムウスの力!

REGULAR.description:
Fire is overwhelmed when faced with the intensely powerful Demon King Mus.  Even the Blazing Knight Bahn is defeated by Mus’s EX move!  Even so, Fire refused to give up and his courageous spirit caused Mini Dragon to evolve!  Will Fire be able to defeat Mus?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Shocking Rebirth! The Scarlet Dragon!
激誕! スカーレッド・ドラゴン!!

REGULAR.description:
After winning the battle against the Demon King Mus, Fire and his friends went back to their normal elementary school lives and one day headed towards the beach.  That’s when Pandora appeared!  Fire and his friends are ecstatic at the idea of having real Oreca Battles again!  Pandora summons Kanicrab for them to battle as a new chapter unfolds!
Source: crunchyroll

Fire and his friends successfully defeat Kanicrab but also find a mysterious card without a name.  After summoning, a warrior appeared but he had no memories!  When all of the sudden Kidoly, who claims to be Demon King Azul’s servant, appears in search of the warrior!  What exactly is this warrior’s identity!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Oreca That Lost Its Memories

REGULAR.description:
Data is envious of Fire’s Scarlet Dragon and starts wanting a powerful dragon of his own.  Pandora, who has been watching this whole time, gives Data an interesting wager!  If Data wins, he gets a dragon of his own, but if he loses he must give up one of his own cards to Pandora!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Trial of the Blue Dragon
ブルードラゴンの試練

REGULAR.description:
Fire and the gang head over to the park to do their independent research project on insects.  When all of the sudden they find Demon King Azul’s servant, Bard Kidoly chasing after Water Warrior Flow!  They’re now tasked with battling insect monsters instead of doing their independent research!  Will they ever be able to finish their homework?!
Source: crunchyroll

Water Warrior Flow’s memories come back to him when he is reminded of the cross he was made to bear, he quickly realizes that he is putting Fire and his friends in danger and decides to run away.  But Fire, who already considers Flow to be among his team, runs out in search for Flow!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: よみがえったフロウの記憶

REGULAR.description:
While looking for Water Warrior Flow, Data and Gantetsu find themselves on the beach facing Scissor Dragon Zarigarion!  Data and Gantetsu combine their powers to battle Zarigarion!  However no matter how many times they attack, Zarigarion’s limbs keep regenerating and his armor-like body isn’t even phased!  Is there any way to defeat Zarigarion?!
Source: crunchyroll

In an attempt to overthrow Demon King Azul, Lone Swordsman Dante boards a ghost ship where Azul is thought to be.  Alas, what was waiting for him wasn’t Azul himself but a Kraken being controlled by Azul!  Dante fell right into the trap!  Fire and the gang are lead by Pandora to defeat the Kraken and help save Dante!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: パイレーツ・オブ・クラーケン

REGULAR.description:
After failing time after time Kidoly is finally kicked out by Demon King Azul.  In an attempt to restore his reputation, Kidoly decides to resurrect the Black Knight GeBulg! GeBulg then evolves into the Knight of Darkness intends to defeat Fire!  It’s a battle of light and dark between the White Knight Cúchulainn, formerly Warrior Tanta, and GeBulg!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Knight of Darkness Versus the Knight of Light

REGULAR.description:
Fire and the gang successfully ward off Bard Kidoly’s attacks.  However Demon King Azul has sent Evil Vice-Admiral Fisca to capture Water Warrior Flow!  Even Blazing Fire Summoner Heat is no match for Fisca who can freely control ice... He’s even powerful enough to stop Scarlet Dragon’s attacks!  Will Flow be captured this time around?!
Source: crunchyroll

Bard Kidoly resents Data for beating him!  Kidoly’s goal shifts from defeating Fire to defeating Data!  Kidoly unleashes his ultimate trump card, Frost Dragon and goes into battle!  Data fights back with his Blue Dragon!  Will Kidoly be able to defeat Data!?  Will this be Kidoly’s final match?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 絶対零度 グランブルー・ドラゴン!

REGULAR.description:
Tide Warrior Flow is dejected after having his spear taken by the evil Vice-Admiral Fisca.  Fire and the gang decide to infiltrate Demon King Azul’s castle in order to get the spear back.  When suddenly Fisca appears in an attempt to capture Flow!  Where will Flow’s fate take him...?
Source: crunchyroll

Fire and friends make their way to the water kingdom in an attempt to help Tide Warrior Flow.  But Demon King Azul’s minions were ready for them!  The hidden secret of the spear and the hidden treasure are about to be revealed!  Lone Swordsman Dante appears as well to settle his fate with Azul and the battle begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Secret Treasure: The Sea King`s Orb
秘宝 海王のオーブ

REGULAR.description:
Fire faces a fierce battle as Demon King Azul evolves into Evil Lord Azul! Data is up against Evil Sea King Tatsudon as Gantetsu and Stream Knight Flow team up with the Lone Swordsman Dante to fight Evil Vice Admiral Fisca.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle Royal in the Evil Depths of the Ocean! Dante`s Decision
魔海大乱戦! ダンテの決意

REGULAR.description:
Data and Gantetsu defeat Evil Vice Admiral Fisca and Evil Sea King Tatsudon and reunites with Fire who is battling Evil Lord Azul. Blazing Knight Bahn is taken down and Fire faces a challenging fight when Lone Swordsman Dante joins forces with Fire!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attacked with Despair! Evil Lord Azul!
襲い来る絶望! 邪神アズール

REGULAR.description:
Fire’s classroom gains a new transfer student by the name of Kaede Mayumi.  Mayumi seems to angrily want to say “what do you even know about Oreca!?” to Fire.  Meanwhile, Pandora invites Fire to battle in a real colosseum.  Fire and the others are brought to “Pyramid”, the newest attraction in an amusement park owned by the Kaede Family.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 打ち鳴らされるDJのゴング

REGULAR.description:
Fire brilliantly defeats all of the monsters Saqqara brings out at the coliseum and he even gets a prize for it! Gantetsu sees this and decides he wants to battle, as well. The coliseum battle heats up! Will Gantetsu be able to win? What will happen to Avadon?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さようならアヴァドン

REGULAR.description:
Fire and Gantetsu get prizes from Saqqara, so they think he`s a great guy, but then an Oreca named Rock appears in front of them, saying he was trying to escape from Saqqara. Saqqara`s true nature slowly comes to light. Eventually, Fire finds out that someone he knows well is also being held captive by Saqqara.
Source: crunchyroll

Saqqara is trying to get his hands on the mysterious transfer student, Kaede Mayumi. Mayumi`s Oreca Battle starts, and he must face the dark dragon, Fafnir! Dark flames attack Mayumi!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新たなるオレカバトラー

REGULAR.description:
Mayumi is defeated by the dark dragon, Fafnir. Fire then comes to Mayumi`s aid and joins the battle and unleashes Rock. What kind of battle awaits them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tremble with Fear! The Dark Dragon Fafnir
戦慄!暗黒竜ファヴニール!

REGULAR.description:
The worst of all of Saqqara’s Dungeons, known as “Dead Hall” is where Stream Warrior Flow is being held captive… Will Fire and his friends be able to rescue Flow from there?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 潜入! サッカーラ監獄

REGULAR.description:
Holy Knight Cuchuliann has been captured and put in Saqqara’s Prison!  Gantetsu battles Hell Warrior Edge in order to distract Saqqara.  Meanwhile Fire enters into Saqqara’s Prison!  The prison break battle is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

Awaiting Fire and the gang deep in the prison were two prison guards, Gozu and Mezu.  Will Fire  be able to withstand their sweet attacks!?  And don’t miss Gantetsu’s battle against Hell Warrior Edge, either!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 地獄のスイーツ ゴズ&メズ

REGULAR.description:
Kerogon, Quetzalcoatl, and even Heavy Dragon Behemoth have been captured by Demon King Saqqara!  And Fire must face Saqqara one-on-one!  Saqqara’s trap, “Desert’s Hospitality” reeks of danger and awaits Fire and the others!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: サプライズ! 砂縛のおもてなし

REGULAR.description:
Fire versus Demon King Saqqara! Data versus Skull Bone Dragon!  Gantetsu versus Ancient Ordnance Moai!  Mayuyu versus Golem!  A never before seen four-way battle has begun!  A mysterious masked man watches over the battle?!  The story unfolds in an unexpected way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 届け! ランプにかける想い

REGULAR.description:
Fire and the others find themselves overwhelmed by Evil Lord Saqqara’s strongest monsters.  However, the Oreca Boys never give up!  Unfortunately, Evil Lord Saqqara, whose power is unmatched as is, gets his hands on none other than “Evil God Stout Beer”!
Source: crunchyroll

Skull Bond Dragon, Ancient Ordnance Moai, and Golem were all defeated by the Oreca Boys!  The only one left is Saqqara himself.  However, Saqqara stands before Fire as an Evil God with unbelievable power!  DJ’s microphone also amps up the battle!  Saqqara’s entertaining performance is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

There is said to be a legendary dragon that lives within a perilous rocky mountain that pierces the heavens within the Oreca realm. That dragon’s name is none other than The Holy Dragon.
Source: crunchyroll

After defeating Saqqara, Fire and the others throw a welcoming party for Mayuyu joining the Oreca Boys at a villa in the woods.  However, in the forest lies kappa, serpent crypts, and crow-billed goblins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Find the Monsters in the Woods!
探せ! 森のモンスター!

REGULAR.description:
Fire is suddenly attacked by Demon King Nanawarai!  A battle begins after Fire is accused of stealing the sacred treasure, “The Seed of the Wind.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 大嵐! 魔王ナナワライ

REGULAR.description:
Fire is cornered by the Eight-Tailed Serpent when the mysterious masked warrior saves him just in time!  Fire then encounters a dehydrated Kappa who wanted to go fishing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Head of the Sacred Wind, Oroshi

REGULAR.description:
After getting away from the danger posed by Demon King Nanawarai, Fire and the others resume their normal lives.  However, unable to reconcile with being accused of stealing the Seed of the Wind, Fire and the gang head back into the forest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Sacred Tree of the Wind
霊木 風しずくの樹

REGULAR.description:
Fire and the gang move further within the Tree of the Wind in order to confront Demon King Nanawarai!  However Harpyja and Silver Dragon stand in the way!  Mayuyu also puts up a fight with his Dragon God Kukulkan!  A fierce battle between dragons is about to begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 電撃進化! ククルカン!

REGULAR.description:
Awaiting the gang on the second level of the Tree of the Wind was a bewitching monster, Dakki!  Gantetsu accepts the challenge himself so Fire can move ahead.  Gantetsu summons Heavy Dragon Behemoth.   A battle between the mini devil and the heavy weight class monster begins!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 衝撃進化! ベヒモス!

REGULAR.description:
Wind Warrior Hayate lead Fire and Data through the Tree of the Wind and made it to the third level, however there were new monsters awaiting them! Data bravely says "Leave this to me!" and summons his monsters! Will Data`s intelligence and strategy be the key to winning this battle?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The One Exiled from the Hidden Family

REGULAR.description:
Fire finally reaches Demon King Nanawarai!  Nanawarai once again demands Fire to return the "Seed of the Wind."  Meanwhile, Data, Gantetsu, and Mayuyu find the "Seed of the Wind", the very thing that has been accused of being stolen, within the Tree of the Wind!  Will Oroshi`s secret finally be revealed?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Truth Behind the Seed of the Wind

REGULAR.description:
The Oreca Boys finally make it to the top of the Tree of the Wind!  However Nanawarai has already turned into an Evil God and his wrath knows no bounds!  He even attacked his own son, Oroshi!  Meanwhile, Nanwarai`s other son Wind Warrior Hayate`s true powers awaken!
Source: crunchyroll

Evil God Nanawarai has shattered the Seed of the Wind with his own hands!  The forest is wilting and the hidden family is one step closer to perishing.  Hayate made the painful decision to battle his own father and evolved into Storm Warrior Hayate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 俺たちのオレカバトル!!!
